00032 void MAsymAnaInfo::ProcessOptions(int argc, char **argv)
00033 {
00034    int option_index = 0;
00035 
00036    static struct option long_options[] = {
00037       {"log",                 optional_argument,   0,   'l'},
00038       {"sfx",                 required_argument,   0,   AnaInfo::OPTION_SUFFIX},
00039       {"graph",               no_argument,         0,   AnaInfo::MODE_GRAPH},
00040       {"copy",                no_argument,         0,   AnaInfo::FLAG_COPY},
00041       {"copy-results",        no_argument,         0,   AnaInfo::FLAG_COPY},
00042       {"update-db",           no_argument,         0,   AnaInfo::FLAG_UPDATE_DB},
00043       {"no-update-db",        no_argument,         0,   AnaInfo::FLAG_NO_UPDATE_DB},
00044       {"use-db",              no_argument,         0,   AnaInfo::FLAG_USE_DB},
00045       {"thumb",               no_argument,         0,   AnaInfo::FLAG_CREATE_THUMBS},
00046       {"meas-list",           required_argument,   0,   MAsymAnaInfo::OPTION_MLIST},
00047       {0, 0, 0, 0}
00048    };
00049 
00050    int c;
00051 
00052    while ((c = getopt_long(argc, argv, "?hl::gm:", long_options, &option_index)) != -1)
00053    {
00054       switch (c) {
00055 
00056       case '?':
00057       case 'h':
00058          PrintUsage();
00059          exit(EXIT_SUCCESS);
00060 
00061       case 'l':
00062          fFileStdLogName = (optarg != 0 ? optarg : "");
00063          break;
00064 
00065       case 'g':
00066       case AnaInfo::MODE_GRAPH:
00067          fModes |= AnaInfo::MODE_GRAPH;
00068          break;
00069 
00070       case AnaInfo::OPTION_SUFFIX:
00071          fSuffix = optarg;
00072          break;
00073 
00074       case AnaInfo::FLAG_USE_DB:
00075          fFlagUseDb    = kTRUE;
00076          fFlagUpdateDb = kTRUE;
00077          break;
00078 
00079       case AnaInfo::FLAG_CREATE_THUMBS:
00080          fFlagCreateThumbs = kTRUE;
00081          break;
00082 
00083       case AnaInfo::FLAG_COPY:
00084          fFlagCopyResults = kTRUE;
00085          break;
00086 
00087       case AnaInfo::FLAG_UPDATE_DB:
00088          fFlagUpdateDb = kTRUE;
00089          break;
00090 
00091       case 'm':
00092       case MAsymAnaInfo::OPTION_MLIST:
00093          SetMListFileName(optarg);
00094          break;
00095 
00096       default:
00097          Error("ProcessOptions", "Invalid option provided");
00098          PrintUsage();
00099          exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00100       }
00101    }
00102 }

00104 
00106 void MAsymAnaInfo::VerifyOptions()
00107 {
00108    // The run name must be specified
00109    if (fMListFileName.empty()) {
00110       Error("VerifyOptions", "File name has to be specified");
00111       PrintUsage();
00112       exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00113    }
00114 
00115    TString tmpFileName(fMListFileName.c_str());
00116 
00117    // file exist?
00118    if ( !gSystem->FindFile( (GetResultsDir() + "/runXX/lists/").c_str(), tmpFileName ) )
00119    {
00120       Error("VerifyOptions",
00121          "File list \"%s\" not found\n", GetMListFullPath().c_str());
00122       exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00123    }
00124 
00125    fOutputName = fMListFileName;
00126 
00127    // The output dir is created here
00128    AnaInfo::VerifyOptions();
00129 }

00141 void MAsymAnaInfo::PrintAsPhp(FILE *f) const
00142 {
00143    AnaInfo::PrintAsPhp(f);
00144    fprintf(f, "$rc['fMListFileName']               = \"%s\";\n", fMListFileName.c_str());
00145    fprintf(f, "\n");
00146 }

00150 void MAsymAnaInfo::PrintUsage()
00151 {
00152    cout << endl;
00153 
00154    AnaInfo::PrintUsage();
00155 
00156    cout << "Options:" << endl;
00157    cout << " -h, -?                               : Print this help" << endl;
00158    cout << " -m, --meas-list <file_name>          : Name of run with raw data in $CNIPOL_RESULTS_DIR directory" << endl;
00159    cout << endl;
